answers.answer: You should always speak with your doctor before adjusting and/or stopping any medication.

blood sugar becomes normal with use of meds.  Now your doctor needs to see if you go too low in your present dose or if  he can monitor a gradual reduction.You are not over the disease - just have it in control.  Often some kind of medicine is always needed.

question: am 26 years old. since last 1.5 years i have using medicine  for the type2 diabetes. now my blood sugars are normal this time. how many days i should continue the medicine. please suggest me soon.
title: Diabetes control
